guidance_title_etxt: How do I do it best?
guidance_content_etxt:
""Register a Drone"" is the first option once you arrive in the Drone Management Portal.

Once selected, you will go to an introductory page. Here you can see all that you need, and important contact information if you get stuck.

Once you begin, the tool will walk you through all the required steps.

Your registration number will look something like ""C-1901534648"".

If you have difficulty with the Drone Management Portal, seek help from Civil Aviation Services.

Civil Aviation Services
Email: tc.aviationservicesont-servicesaviationont.tc@tc.gc.ca

Telephone: 1-800-305-2059

Hours of operation: Monday to Friday
8:30 am to 4:30 pm EST

guidance_title_etxt: How do I do it best?
guidance_content_etxt:
If you are using a label, make sure you place it on the drone so that it won't get in the way of moving parts. If the label falls off, you will need to replace it before your next flight.

If your number get smudged, you will need to re-write it before your next flight.
guidance_content_ftxt:
If you are using a label, make sure you place it on the drone so that it won't get in the way of moving parts. If the label falls off, you will need to replace it before your next flight.

If your number get smudged, you will need to re-write it before your next flight.

(fr)

guidance_title_etxt: How do I do it best?
guidance_content_etxt: You can choose how you want to mark your drone (permanent marker, label, etc) as long as the number is clear to read.
guidance_content_ftxt: You can choose how you want to mark your drone (permanent marker, label, etc) as long as the number is clear to read. (fr)

guidance_title_etxt: How do I do it best?
guidance_content_etxt: The manufacturer of your drone should provide instructions for your drone. You can usually find these on the manufacturer's website, or on the website of the store where you bought your drone. If you can't find your drone's instruction manual, you should contact the manufacturer or store to request one.

You can usually find these on the manufacturer's website, or on the website of the store where you bought your drone. If you can't find your drone's instruction manual, you should contact the manufacturer or store to request one.(fr)

Vous pouvez généralement le trouver sur le site Web du fabricant ou sur le site Web du magasin où vous avez acheté votre drone. Si vous ne trouvez pas le manuel d’instruction de votre drone, contactez le fabricant ou le magasin pour en obtenir un.

guidance_content_etxt: The Drone Management Portal is where you manage your registrations and pilot certificates.
guidance_content_ftxt: The Drone Management Portal is where you manage your registrations and pilot certificates. (fr)

guidance_content_etxt:
Purchase date
Some pilots will have purchased their drone from a store. Others will have built their drone themselves, and won't have a purchase date.
Drone DetailsWhether you purchased your drone or built it yourself, you need to provide these details when you register.
Payment cards
The accepted types of payment are Visa, Mastercard, American Express, or Interac card.

guidance_content_etxt: If you lose your drone, a well marked drone is easier to return to you.
guidance_content_ftxt: If you lose your drone, a well marked drone is easier to return to you. (fr)

guidance_content_etxt: If you lose your drone, a well marked drone is easier to return to you.

guidance_title_etxt: How do I do it best?
guidance_content_etxt:
The manufacturer of your drone should provide you with instructions. You can find these:
- in the box with your drone,
- on the manufacturer's website,
- in some cases, on the website of the store where you bought your drone.

If you can't find your drone's instructions, you can contact the manufacturer to request them.
guidance_content_ftxt:
The manufacturer of your drone should provide you with instructions. You can find these:
- in the box with your drone,
- on the manufacturer's website,
- in some cases, on the website of the store where you bought your drone.

If you can't find your drone's instructions, you can contact the manufacturer to request them.

(fr)

guidance_title_etxt: How do I do it best?
guidance_content_etxt:
Ask yourself the following questions:

1. Have I flown this make and model of drone before?
2. Am I experienced enough to do the things I want to do?
3. Am I aware of all things to keep you and your drone safe?

If you find yourself uncertain of your ability to be safe, make your flight operation easier.

Tips to make flight operations easier:
- Keep your drone low
- Keep your drone close to you
- Keep your flight short
- Fly on a day with little to no wind
- Fly on a day with little clouds

guidance_content_etxt: Transport Canada has provided an online tool to make managing your certificates easy.
guidance_content_ftxt: Transport Canada has provided an online tool to make managing your certificates easy. (fr)

guidance_content_etxt: These details allow notifications of any recalls to your equipment. It may also help you find your drone if it's lost. You need to pay the $10 registration fee online using the methods specified.
guidance_content_ftxt: These details allow notifications of any recalls to your equipment. It may also help you find your drone if it's lost. You need to pay the $10 registration fee online using the methods specified. (fr)

guidance_content_etxt:
Registration is an important part of ensuring safety. Despite our best efforts, there will be pilots who engage in risky flights. Knowing who owns the drone will help us correct their actions.

There are other benefits to registration. If you lose your drone, registration may help in returning it to you if found. If there is a recall from the manufacturer, we may be able to notify you.
guidance_content_ftxt:
Registration is an important part of ensuring safety. Despite our best efforts, there will be pilots who engage in risky flights. Knowing who owns the drone will help us correct their actions.

There are other benefits to registration. If you lose your drone, registration may help in returning it to you if found. If there is a recall from the manufacturer, we may be able to notify you.

(fr)

guidance_title_etxt: How do I do it best?
guidance_content_etxt:
Access the Drone Management Portal here: www.canada.ca/drones-portal
For information about secure sign-in options, go here: https://gart.tc.gc.ca/public-publique/faq/v2/faq-eng.htm?ret=https%3A%2F%2Fgart.tc.gc.ca%2Fsecure%2Fgalro-aglie%2F
guidance_content_ftxt:
Access the Drone Management Portal here: www.canada.ca/drones-portal
For information about secure sign-in options, go here: https://gart.tc.gc.ca/public-publique/faq/v2/faq-eng.htm?ret=https%3A%2F%2Fgart.tc.gc.ca%2Fsecure%2Fgalro-aglie%2F

(fr)

guidance_content_etxt: Your Transport Canada registration number must be clearly marked on your drone.
guidance_content_ftxt: Your Transport Canada registration number must be clearly marked on your drone. (fr)

guidance_content_etxt:
In your drone's instruction manual, find out:

- how to charge or fuel your drone - how long the battery will last when fully charged - how much power your drone needs to get safely back to you - what the drone will do when the batter power is low (e.g. will it warn the pilot, return to home)

All drones are different. It is important to review the instruction manual that comes with the drone you are planning to fly, even if you have flown other models before.
guidance_content_ftxt:
In your drone's instruction manual, find out:

- how to charge or fuel your drone - how long the battery will last when fully charged - how much power your drone needs to get safely back to you - what the drone will do when the batter power is low (e.g. will it warn the pilot, return to home)

All drones are different. It is important to review the instruction manual that comes with the drone you are planning to fly, even if you have flown other models before.

(fr)

guidance_title_etxt: How do I do it best?
guidance_content_etxt:
Purchase Date (if applicable) is best found on your receipt. You can also recall from memory. You don't need a receipt to register.

Your drone details are best found in your drone's user manual. If you've lost your manual, you may contact the manufacturer to request a new one. You cannot complete registration without this information.

The serial number is a unique product number. It's usually found on the barcode of the box.
guidance_content_ftxt:
Purchase Date (if applicable) is best found on your receipt. You can also recall from memory. You don't need a receipt to register.

Your drone details are best found in your drone's user manual. If you've lost your manual, you may contact the manufacturer to request a new one. You cannot complete registration without this information.

The serial number is a unique product number. It's usually found on the barcode of the box.

(fr)

guidance_title_etxt: How do I do it best?
guidance_content_etxt: The manufacturer of your drone should provide instructions for your drone. You can find these on the manufacturer's website, or on the website of the store where you bought your drone. If you can't find your drone's instruction manual, you will need to contact the manufacturer or store to request one.
guidance_content_ftxt: The manufacturer of your drone should provide instructions for your drone. You can find these on the manufacturer's website, or on the website of the store where you bought your drone. If you can't find your drone's instruction manual, you will need to contact the manufacturer or store to request one.(fr)

guidance_content_etxt:
In your drone's instruction manual, find:

  • how your drone connects to its controller (e.g. wifi)
  • how far away your drone can be flown without losing connection with the controller
  • how your drone will react to a lost connection (e.g. hover, return home, land)

Trees, hills, and other obstacles between your controller and drone can weaken the connection.

All drones are different. It's important to read the instruction manual for your drone, even if you've flown other models before.
guidance_content_ftxt:
Dans le manuel d’instruction de votre drone, trouvez :

  • La façon dont votre drone se connecte à sa télécommande (ex. : Wi-Fi).
  • La distance à laquelle votre drone peut voler sans perdre la connexion avec la télécommande.
  • La façon dont votre drone réagira à une perte de connexion (ex. : faire du surplace, rentrer, atterrir).

Les arbres, les collines et les autres obstacles entre votre télécommande et le drone peuvent affaiblir la connexion.

Tous les drones sont différents. Il est important de lire le manuel d’instruction de votre drone, même si vous avez déjà piloté d’autres modèles.

guidance_content_etxt:
To fly safely, you need to understand how the weather affects your drone. You also need to know what to do if the weather changes while you're flying.

Weather can affect:
  • your ability to control your drone. For example, turbulence could blow your drone off course.
  • how long your drone can be flown. For example, cold temperatures can limit a battery's performance.
guidance_content_ftxt:
Pour voler en toute sécurité, vous devez comprendre la façon dont les conditions météorologiques affectent votre drone. Vous devez aussi savoir quoi faire si les conditions météorologiques changent pendant que vous volez.

Les conditions météorologiques peuvent affecter :
  • Votre capacité à contrôler votre drone. Une turbulence, par exemple, pourrait faire dévier votre drone de sa trajectoire.
  • L'autonomie de vol de votre drone. Des températures froides, par exemple, peuvent limiter le rendement d’une batterie.

guidance_content_etxt: Knowing about your drone's battery or fuel supply will help you understand how far and how long you can fly safely. Running out of power could lead to a crash, and cause harm to other people or aircraft.
guidance_content_ftxt: Connaître la batterie de votre drone ou son alimentation en carburant vous aidera à comprendre jusqu’où vous pouvez voler en toute sécurité et le temps dont vous disposez. Être à court d’énergie pourrait entraîner un accident et causer du tort à d’autres personnes ou des dommages à un aéronef.

guidance_title_etxt: How do I do it best?
guidance_content_etxt: The manufacturer of your drone should provide instructions for your drone. These can usually be found on the manufacturer's website, or on the website of the store where you bought your drone. If you can't find your drone's instruction manual, contact the manufacturer or store to ask for one.
guidance_content_ftxt: Le fabricant de votre drone doit fournir un mode d’emploi pour votre machine. Vous pouvez généralement les trouver sur le site Web du fabricant ou sur le site Web du magasin où vous avez acheté votre drone. Si vous ne trouvez pas le manuel d’instruction de votre drone, contactez le fabricant ou le magasin pour en obtenir un.

guidance_content_etxt:
To fly safe, you need a good connection between the controller (remote control or phone/tablet) and your drone. If the connection is weak or lost, you can lose control of your drone, and it could become a danger to people or aircraft.

When there's a weak connection, some drones will stop, land or return to a point you've specified. Make sure you know how your drone reacts in these situations so that you can avoid risks.

Here's an example: You'll be flying over a body of water. You know that your drone will land automatically if the signal is lost. You prepare by double-checking the weather and your flight plan.
guidance_content_ftxt:
Pour voler en toute sécurité, vous avez besoin d’une bonne connexion entre la télécommande (manette, téléphone ou tablette) et votre drone. Si la connexion est faible ou perdue, vous pouvez perdre le contrôle de votre drone, et cela pourrait devenir un danger pour les personnes ou les aéronefs.

Lorsqu’il y a une connexion faible, certains drones s’arrêtent, atterrissent ou reviennent à un point que vous avez spécifié. Assurez-vous de savoir comment votre drone réagit dans ces situations afin d’éviter les risques.

En voici un exemple : Vous survolerez un plan d’eau. Vous savez que votre drone atterrira automatiquement si le signal est perdu. Vous vous préparez en vérifiant les conditions météorologiques et votre plan de vol.

guidance_content_etxt: Keeping your drone in good condition will ensure it flies properly. If you don't take care of your drone, it might not work properly. This can be dangerous for people, the drone, and aircraft.
guidance_content_ftxt: Maintenir votre drone en bon état lui permettra de voler correctement. Si vous ne prenez pas soin de votre drone, il se peut qu’il ne fonctionne pas correctement. Cela peut être dangereux pour les personnes, les drones et les aéronefs.

guidance_title_etxt: How do I do it best?
guidance_content_etxt: The manufacturer of your drone should provide instructions for your drone. These can usually be found on the manufacturer's website, or on the website of the store where you bought your drone. If you can't find your drone's instruction manual, contact the manufacturer or store to ask for one.
guidance_content_ftxt: Le fabricant de votre drone doit fournir un mode d’emploi pour votre machine. Vous pouvez généralement le trouver sur le site Web du fabricant ou sur le site Web du magasin où vous avez acheté votre drone. Si vous ne trouvez pas le manuel d’utilisation de votre drone, contactez le fabricant ou le magasin pour en obtenir un.

guidance_content_etxt: Your Transport Canada registration number must be clearly marked on your drone. The Drone Management Portal provides your registration number. The format of the number is "C" followed by ten digits (e.g. C-1234567890).
guidance_content_ftxt: Your Transport Canada registration number must be clearly marked on your drone. The Drone Management Portal provides your registration number. The format of the number is "C" followed by ten digits (e.g. C-1234567890). (fr)

guidance_title_etxt: How do I do it best?
guidance_content_etxt: The manufacturer of your drone should provide instructions for your drone. These can usually be found on the manufacturer's website, or on the website of the store where you bought your drone. If you can't find your drone's instruction manual, contact the manufacturer or store to ask for one.
guidance_content_ftxt: Le fabricant de votre drone doit fournir un mode d'emploi pour votre machine. Vous pouvez généralement les trouver sur le site Web du fabricant ou sur le site Web du magasin où vous avez acheté votre drone. Si vous ne trouvez pas le manuel d’instruction de votre drone, contactez le fabricant ou le magasin pour en obtenir un.

guidance_content_etxt: Understanding your drone's battery or fuel supply helps you to understand how far and how long you can fly safely. Running out of power could cause you to crash your drone. It could put other people or aircraft in danger.
guidance_content_ftxt: Understanding your drone's battery or fuel supply helps you to understand how far and how long you can fly safely. Running out of power could cause you to crash your drone. It could put other people or aircraft in danger.(fr)

guidance_content_etxt:
You need to have a good connection between the controller (remote control or phone/tablet) and your drone to fly safe. When the connection is weak or lost, you will not be able to reliably control your drone. Your drone could become a danger to people or other aircraft.

When there is a weak connection, some drones will stop, land or return to a position you have specified. Make sure you know how your drone performs, so that you can avoid any risks if it happens.

Example situation: You are flying over a body of water. You know that your drone lands automatically when the signal is lost. You take extra care to know the weather and your flight plan.
guidance_content_ftxt:
You need to have a good connection between the controller (remote control or phone/tablet) and your drone to fly safe. When the connection is weak or lost, you will not be able to reliably control your drone. Your drone could become a danger to people or other aircraft.

When there is a weak connection, some drones will stop, land or return to a position you have specified. Make sure you know how your drone performs, so that you can avoid any risks if it happens.

Example situation: You are flying over a body of water. You know that your drone lands automatically when the signal is lost. You take extra care to know the weather and your flight plan.

(fr)

guidance_content_etxt: Having control of your drone is important to protect it, other people, and other aircraft. Understanding how to control your drone will help you react quickly and safely.
guidance_content_ftxt: Having control of your drone is important to protect it, other people, and other aircraft. Understanding how to control your drone will help you react quickly and safely.(fr)

guidance_content_etxt:
Each drone you own must have its own registration number. If you have 3 drones, you need to register all 3. They will each receive their own registration number.
Your registration number is good for the life of your drone. For example, if you sell or break your drone, you will need to de-register it. If you move, you will need to update your address. You can do this in the Drone Management Portal (canada.ca/drones-portal).
Read the registration regulations here. (https://lois-laws.justice.gc.ca/eng/regulations/SOR-96-433/page-164.html#h-1111590)
guidance_content_ftxt:
Each drone you own must have its own registration number. If you have 3 drones, you need to register all 3. They will each receive their own registration number.
Your registration number is good for the life of your drone. For example, if you sell or break your drone, you will need to de-register it. If you move, you will need to update your address. You can do this in the Drone Management Portal (canada.ca/drones-portal).
Read the registration regulations here. (https://lois-laws.justice.gc.ca/eng/regulations/SOR-96-433/page-164.html#h-1111590) (fr)

guidance_content_etxt:
In your drone's instruction manual, find:

  • the lowest and highest temperatures that your drone can safely fly in
  • other weather-related limits of your drone, including rain and wind (maximum wind speed)

Think about how the weather could affect the controller (remote control or phone/tablet). For example, on a very sunny day, would you get glare on a phone or tablet?

All drones are different. It is important to read the instruction manual for your drone, even if you have flown other models before.
guidance_content_ftxt:
Dans le manuel d’instruction de votre drone, trouvez :

  • Les températures les plus basses et les plus élevées dans lesquelles votre drone peut voler en toute sécurité.
  • D’autres limites liées aux conditions météorologiques de votre drone, y compris la pluie et le vent (vitesse maximale du vent).

Pensez à la façon dont les conditions météorologiques pourraient affecter la télécommande (manette, téléphone, ou tablette). Par une journée très ensoleillée, par exemple, pourriez-vous être ébloui sur un téléphone ou une tablette?

Tous les drones sont différents. Il est important de lire le manuel d’utilisation de votre drone, même si vous avez déjà piloté d’autres modèles.

guidance_content_etxt:
In your drone's instruction manual, find out:

- how your drone connects to the controller (e.g. wifi)
- how far away from you your drone can be flown without losing connection with the controller
- how your drone will react to a lost connection (e.g. hover, return to home, land)

Obstacles between your controller and your drone can make the connection weaker. Obstacles include things like hills, and trees.

All drones are different. It is important to review the instruction manual for your drone, even if you have flown other models before.
guidance_content_ftxt:
In your drone's instruction manual, find out:

- how your drone connects to the controller (e.g. wifi)
- how far away from you your drone can be flown without losing connection with the controller
- how your drone will react to a lost connection (e.g. hover, return to home, land)

Obstacles between your controller and your drone can make the connection weaker. Obstacles include things like hills, and trees.

All drones are different. It is important to review the instruction manual for your drone, even if you have flown other models before.

(fr)

guidance_content_etxt:
In your drone's instruction manual, find out:

- the lowest and highest temperatures safe to fly your drone
- other weather-related limits to flying your drone, including rain and wind (maximum wind speed)

You also need to think about how the weather might affect the controller (remote control or phone/tablet). For example, on a very sunny day, you may get glare on a phone or tablet.

All drones are different. It is important to review the instruction manual for your drone, even if you have flown other models before.
guidance_content_ftxt:
In your drone's instruction manual, find out:

- the lowest and highest temperatures safe to fly your drone
- other weather-related limits to flying your drone, including rain and wind (maximum wind speed)

You also need to think about how the weather might affect the controller (remote control or phone/tablet). For example, on a very sunny day, you may get glare on a phone or tablet.

All drones are different. It is important to review the instruction manual for your drone, even if you have flown other models before.

(fr)

guidance_content_etxt:
In your drone's instruction manual, find out how to care for your drone, its batteries (or fuel system), and the controller(s).

This could include:
- how to store the drone
- how to store the batteries
- how to keep the drone clean
- how to identify signs of wear that might affect how your drone works.

All drones are different. It is important to review the instruction manual for your drone, even if you have flown other models before.
guidance_content_ftxt:
In your drone's instruction manual, find out how to care for your drone, its batteries (or fuel system), and the controller(s).

This could include:
- how to store the drone
- how to store the batteries
- how to keep the drone clean
- how to identify signs of wear that might affect how your drone works.

All drones are different. It is important to review the instruction manual for your drone, even if you have flown other models before.

(fr)

guidance_content_etxt:
In your drone's instruction manual, find out about:

1. What controller your manufacturer recommends for use with your drone. An example would be remote controller or a specific software to use with a mobile device.

2. How your remote control works: how it's powered, what the joysticks/buttons do. This information may come from the documentation of the remote controller.

3. How to use the drone's control software. This should include:
- how to turn off other notifications on your device to avoid distractions,
- how to keep the control software up to date,
- how to learn about new features,
- any pre-programmed emergency procedures that the drone might perform. For example, in cases of a lost connection with the controller, your drone may land itself.

It is important that you review all instructions that come with any drone equipment.
guidance_content_ftxt:
In your drone's instruction manual, find out about:

1. What controller your manufacturer recommends for use with your drone. An example would be remote controller or a specific software to use with a mobile device.

2. How your remote control works: how it's powered, what the joysticks/buttons do. This information may come from the documentation of the remote controller.

3. How to use the drone's control software. This should include:
- how to turn off other notifications on your device to avoid distractions,
- how to keep the control software up to date,
- how to learn about new features,
- any pre-programmed emergency procedures that the drone might perform. For example, in cases of a lost connection with the controller, your drone may land itself.

It is important that you review all instructions that come with any drone equipment.

(fr)

guidance_content_etxt: If this is your first time flying this drone, it's a good idea to start off with an easy flight. This could look like a short, low altitude flight when the weather is calm. Starting off easy will help you gain experience with the drone and its controls.
guidance_content_ftxt: If this is your first time flying this drone, it's a good idea to start off with an easy flight. This could look like a short, low altitude flight when the weather is calm. Starting off easy will help you gain experience with the drone and its controls.  (fr)

guidance_content_etxt:
In your drone's instruction manual, find:

  • how to charge or fuel your drone
  • how long the battery will last when it's fully charged
  • how much power your drone needs to get safely back to you
  • what the drone will do when it's battery power is low (e.g. will it warn you, or return home)

All drones are different. It is important to read the instruction manual that comes with the drone you are planning to fly, even if you have flown other models before.
guidance_content_ftxt:
Dans le manuel d’instruction de votre drone, trouvez :

  • La façon de charger ou de ravitailler votre drone.
  • La durée de vie de la batterie lorsqu’elle est complètement chargée.
  • L’énergie dont votre drone a besoin pour vous revenir en toute sécurité.
  • Ce que fera le drone lorsque sa batterie sera faible (par exemple, vous avertira-t-il ou rentrera-t-il de lui-même).

Tous les drones sont différents. Il est important de lire le manuel d’instructions qui accompagne le drone que vous prévoyez piloter, même si vous avez déjà piloté d’autres modèles.

guidance_content_etxt:
In your drone's instruction manual, learn how to care for your drone, its batteries (or fuel system), and the controller(s).

This could include:
  • how to store the drone
  • how to store the batteries
  • how to keep the drone clean
  • how to identify signs of wear that could affect how your drone works.

All drones are different. It is important to review the instruction manual for your drone, even if you have flown other models before.
guidance_content_ftxt:
Dans le manuel d’utilisation, apprenez à prendre soin de votre drone, de ses batteries (ou de son circuit carburant) et de sa télécommande.

Cela pourrait inclure :
  • La façon d’entreposer le drone.
  • La façon de ranger les batteries.
  • La façon de nettoyer le drone.
  • La façon de repérer les signes d’usure qui pourraient nuire au fonctionnement de votre drone.

Tous les drones sont différents. Il est important de lire le manuel d’utilisation de votre drone, même si vous avez déjà piloté d’autres modèles.

guidance_content_etxt:
To fly your drone safely, you need to understand how the weather impacts your drone. You also need to know what to do if the weather changes while you are flying.

Weather may affect:
- your ability to control your drone. For example, turbulence could blow your drone off course.
- how long your drone can be flown. For example, cold temperatures may limit a battery's performance.
guidance_content_ftxt:
To fly your drone safely, you need to understand how the weather impacts your drone. You also need to know what to do if the weather changes while you are flying.

Weather may affect:
- your ability to control your drone. For example, turbulence could blow your drone off course.
- how long your drone can be flown. For example, cold temperatures may limit a battery's performance.

(fr)

guidance_content_etxt: Maintaining your drone will keep it in good condition and help to make sure that it flies properly. An unmaintained drone could do something unexpected. This can be dangerous for people, the drone, and other aircraft.
guidance_content_ftxt: Maintaining your drone will keep it in good condition and help to make sure that it flies properly. An unmaintained drone could do something unexpected. This can be dangerous for people, the drone, and other aircraft.(fr)

guidance_content_etxt: Even if you have flown drones before, each product is different. Building your confidence over time is the best way to ensure safety of your drone and others.
guidance_content_ftxt: Even if you have flown drones before, each product is different. Building your confidence over time is the best way to ensure safety of your drone and others. (fr)
